page.title: 12DRAMA IN WOOKEY HOLE CAVES
page.content:
AS I WALKED UP THE PATH, THE CAVES SEEMED TO BE BECKONING ME IN.I OPENED THE DOOR,I CREPT IN CAUTIOUSLY,TRYING NOT TO DISTURB THE BATS WHICH DANGLED HIGH ABOVE ON THE ROCK FACE.
LIGHT SHOWED UP WATER SEEPING OUT OF THE LIMESTONE WALLS, THEN SOMETHING FELL ON ME, I JUMPED,BUT IT WAS ONLY A DROP OF WATER WHOSE SOUND ECHOED AROUND THE CHAMBER.
MY HEART BEAT FASTER, WAS SOMEONE WATCHING ME? THEN I SAW THE WITCH,SHE SEEMED TO MOVE, BUT ALL WAS STILL, EXCEPT FOR THE ROWING BOAT FLOATING LIKE A FEATHER ON THE RIVER AXE, LONELY AND WAITING. THEN THERE WAS A SOUND, FOOTSTEPS WERE FOLLOWING ME, NOT HUMAN....I RAN TO THE ENTRANCE, BREATHLESS,A LONELY LOST DOG THANKFULLY ARRIVED AT THE SAME TIME!.
